signatures.generic_detection: This malware behaves like a Trojan horse, performing unauthorized actions on the host system.
Displays unwanted advertisements and potentially collects user data without consent.
Self-replicating malware that spreads through networks or removable devices.
Monitors user activity, capturing sensitive information such as keystrokes or credentials.
Encrypts files or locks systems, demanding payment for data recovery.
Grants unauthorized access to attackers while hiding its presence from detection tools.
Opens unauthorized communication channels to allow remote control of the host system.
Facilitates the download and execution of other malicious payloads onto the system.
Potentially unwanted program that may degrade system performance or introduce risks.
Targets vulnerabilities in software to execute malicious code or gain unauthorized access.
